ensg.tsi.majortom

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • ensg.tsi.majortom.Context

  • public class Context
extends Object
    Class to define the context of the georeferencer
    Author:
    Rose Mathelier

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private List<CheckPoint> checkPoints
      The list of check points (points whose field coordinates are known, used to verify the accuracy after the transformation).
      private List<ControlPoint> controlPoints
      The list of control points (points whose field coordinates are known, used to determine the parameters of the transformation).
      private String inputPath
      The path of the shapefile to georeference.
      private String outputName
      The name of the georeferenced shapefile.
      private String outputPath
      The directory where the output layer should be written.

      • Context

        public Context(String inputPath,
               String outputPath,
               String outputName,
               List<ControlPoint> GCPs,
               List<CheckPoint> CPs)
        Constructor with input and output paths, control points and checkpoints.
        Parameters:
        inputPath - The path of the shapefile to georeference.
        outputPath - The directory where the output layer should be written.
        outputName - The name of the georeferenced shapefile.
        GCPs - The list of control points (points whose field coordinates are known, used to determine the parameters of the transformation).
        CPs - The list of check points (points whose field coordinates are known, used to verify the accuracy after the transformation).
